title: Riot, wake up! New Rengar will be more OP than ever before

replies.body:
I mean, if we're taking that sort of approach...

Necklace: No longer gives previous bonuses
Passive: Stacks removed when out of combat long enough
Q: Can miss, can't crit, doesn't apply on hits
W: Healing now situational
E: Same
R: Nerfed to Camouflage (Evelynn stealth), can't just insta jump to anyone.

Rengar's getting an update that shifts him towards more sustained combat patterns and more hunter like play before a fight. That means buffs in some regards, nerfs in other ways.

I still don't see how how Q can be missed unless target instantly flashed away or has dash (means it's another assassin), because Rengar will jump right on his target: from bush or from ult.

Another question: don't you think Rengar will go tanky a-la Fiora or tankEkko?

As far as I know, players were able to get away with tank Fiora/Ekko because they have percent health damages that they were able to exploit. 

Ren doesn't have any.
Now even koreans play Rengo tank sometimes. After update he'll get more tankiness. Than why this can't be abused?

Because using the ferocity stacks on one ability means that you can no longer use it on others. If you use the empowered w, you cleanse all cc, but you lose out on a lot of damage and cc. In 90% of ganks, you'll only be able to use an empowered ability once, maybe twice. In teamfights, three is probably the most, and that's for really long messy teamfights.

I overall see these as nerfs to rengar, and rengar is one of my mains, but at the same time I do think this puts him on more a skill curve and most "Fun + interactive" kit, so overall I like it. Assassin rework seems to be very promising and perhaps the best one yall have to date.
Everyone has a delayed burst.

Meddler as a Rengar main I would really like to know what it is that compelled you guys to change Rengar's Q into a cleave skillshot, I love the idea as i feel it fits him more, a savage strike across the target and then that lunge forward trying to strike a killing blow. And the other thing. You guys said that Rengar no longer gets the short end of the stick when it comes to the hunt. Now the way I understand that is he will get a different reward for winning the hunt. Please explain to me what it is. As I find increased bush vision somewhat dull and hardly noticeable in comparison to that Bug getting to evolve a 4th time.

Do you know why the bonetooth also gets stacked off assists? Getting assists in fights seems more like an inevitability than achievement. Would you consider changing it to only kills (like Draven's passive) if Rengar turns out to be too snowbally? Also the thematic is kind of confusing, since Rengar doesn't actually get the bounty from an assist, so he doesn't really take the trophy if he isn't the person performing the takedown.

He can do all of that, but he can't do all of that _at once_.

He needs to choose between high damage (Emp Q), CC immunity (Emp W), or CC (Emp E).

I like how OP took all the positives from the abilities and completely ignored all the negatives and restraints to their uses and only then calls it OP.... lol

Might want to fully read something in the future before bitching about it, pro tip.

That's Gameplay boards for you.
Don't expect logic when people are crying, especially about assassins.

I predicted Ekko nerfs right after release, while everyone downvoted my topic about it like this one. I'm playing with high diamond guys. I'm playing pc games for like 20 years. I'm making games myself. Why do you think YOUR opinion is more professional than mine?

Some mechanics can't be balanced, and champion with them will have low numbers and will be unplayable, or will have ok numbers, and will be permabanned. Some pluses can't be compensated by any minuses.

I accept that I can be wrong and Rengo will be great, but I'm personally against mechanics that can cancel cc on champions that have just one counterplay - cc .

Are you kidding? Rengar finally gets counterplay, and he will take quite a lot of skill to master. No more single click kills. 

His Q is a _freaking skill shot, for Aurelion's sake_

His signature _melee_ attack can now be dodged through positioning alone!
Can you dodge Talons W? Same here.

Did you even look at the page for assassins? Talon's W is significantly easier to dodge now, especially since it now only slows on the way back. Please do your research before bitching about something.
What research? I meant Talon now on live servers.
Which means jackshit?
Neptune, are you following all my topics? I know we have absolutely different game visions, so why do you even try to comment my opinion?

?
I'm saying live Talon means jackshit since it's being scrapped. So it's entirely meaningless whether or not you can dodge the current W. The new W is far slower.
I didn't see yet how fast new rengo's q. If it's slow as new talon's w, then I'll believe that victim can dodge rengo's burst.

I don't know what you're talking about. His ult got massively nerfed man.  He can now only blow up fragile carries if he can get to them without being seen.  I can tell you from being an Evelynn main, flanking takes a lot more work and time than running through the entire enemy team like he used to be able to do

I've played both eve and rengo. Both have problems initiating vs grouped teams. Both can easily kill lonely targets. 

You need to flank only you're going to initiate. Otherwise both reng and eve have tools to jump right on carriers when fight started. Plus good teams put wards when they see rengo buff, still dying to a fed rengo. So I don't really see huge difference for rengo in teamfights after future update. 
But there will difference for lonely targets - they will be able to see rengo when he'll be close. But else after update he'll get tools to ignore this victim's advantage.

It's not JUST that he's visible, he can only leap to the enemy closest to him out of his ultimate, so he has to have flash up AND go deep to get on a back line champion in a team fight unless they position badly or he has time to flank beforehand.  Either way, it's much much harder for him

Also, his heal is completely gone, which HEAVILY cuts into his sustain and was part of what let him get so far ahead with Jungleing or Top Laneing so he could reach the point that he was a one-shot nightmare.
Doesn't his W heals even without Ferocity now?
Yeah, what he lost was the resists
Yeah, I misread that part of the breakdown so that's my bad.

One fact about his ult:

It can't reveal all of the enemies' location on-cast like his current kit does. It only reveals the one enemy who's nearest to Rengar. So who knows, you probably ulted a tanky Malphite for no goddamn reason.
You can walk around to try to find the squishy, but the issue is it works like Eve, meaning they see you too if you get too close. xD

I have 14 seconds to run around like a headless chicken and risk running into a pink ward looking for someone when they are all most likely grouped with malphite since they all know rengar fucking used r everyone group and make him useless as urgot right now.
Your job is to catch lonely targets, for teamfights you need to be tanky or super fed

TANKY that is what i hate. As a rengar main I was promised from riot that rengar will REMAIN an assassin..... Now he is a tank his burst takes a long time to get off and he dives 1v5 and he is probably gonna die for it without getting a kill now unless he builds 3 tank items. And also how am I supposed to know someone is lonely when they get a mark on their head that says rengar can see you, you should group with your team so you dont die.

Intresting, how Eve is even playable all those years with such kind of mechanics? 

Eve is playable, so Rengo will be ok too.

I'm just curious about one thing. Riot said that they want Rengar to be able to hunt the most dangerous prey and not just squishy carries. But with this update, all they're doing is making even killing carries a challenge, as it's much easier now to outplay him. Rengar definitely won't be able to kill any stronger prey any better than before the update. Just my 2 cents. I seriously hope I'm missing something here.
